alert.note: Alert for Lassen (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 14 at 1:26PM PDT until March 15 at 4:00PM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY NEXT WEEK... * WHAT...Hydrologic flooding caused by excessive rainfall and snowmelt is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of northeast California, including the following county, Lassen. * WHEN...Until early next week. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas along the Pit River and into Big Valley. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1259 PM PDT, The Pit River will continue to rise through the end of the week, with minor flooding possible. Additional contributions from local creeks may compound flooding issues in Big Valley. - Next update on Friday, March 17. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Nubieber, Bieber. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
